entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
